name: Pacific Coast Flyers
about: Pacific Coast Flyers is a FAR Part 91 non-profit flying club based at McLellan-Palomar Airport in Carlsbad, California. Since 1999, we have provided quality flight training and aircraft rental in San Diego, Riverside, and Orange Counties. Our mission is to offer a safe, fun, and educational flying experience with a modern and diverse fleet of well-maintained aircraft at reasonable rates. We promote a sense of community among members and the general aviation community, emphasizing safety through continuing education and open discussion. With a strong focus on safety, we host seminars, share knowledge, and maintain strict safety standards to ensure our members have the best flying experience possible. Join us for a flying community that prioritizes safety, education, and camaraderie.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Instrument Rating (IR)"]
